_header: O fair I wot ye have in remembrance
_description:
Charles d’Orléans, ‘The bond of love’, translated from the French (Champollion-Figeac (1842)
XChampollion-Figeac, Aime. Les Poesies du duc Charles d’Orleans. Paris, 1842, 79) — three 9-line stanzas (ababbccdd) and Envoy (aabb)

BLHar682.First Lines:
O Fayre y wot ye haue in remembraunceWithouten fayle this trust y
                    in certayne…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…Shall say hit yow more playne to yowre plesereIf so that tyme
                    or nede hit lust requere
BLHar682.Facsimiles:
